title: i need 48 orange essence for one skin project katarina

replies.body: Hey there!  Your best bet would be to continue player the game and collecting chests through leveling up as well as mastery chests via [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).  You're nearly there, good luck!
